name: Syed Hassan Ahmed
title: Data Scientist • Data Analyst • ServiceNow Developer • AR Developer • Researcher

about.headline: I am currently pursuing a Master’s degree in Data Science and actively seeking opportunities to apply my skills in real-world environments. I enjoy working on projects that combine data science, software engineering, technical support, and applied analytics through reporting and visualization to solve practical problems. My experience spans academic research, applied projects, and community involvement, with a focus on building reliable, scalable, and easy-to-understand solutions. I value learning new technologies, taking ownership of work, delivering results on time, and clearly explaining complex concepts. Currently, I am strengthening my skills in data engineering, analytics, system automation, integrations, and industry certifications while contributing to impactful, real-world projects.

education.school: University of St. Thomas, MN, USA

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science
education.school: Arya College of Engineering & I.T., RJ, India
